data.event: Neighboring Township 13, now Columbia Falls, was joined with Township 12 and incorporated as the Town of Columbia in 1796.

event.title: incorporated as the Town of Columbia in 1796

data.event: Neighboring Township 13, now Columbia Falls, was joined with Township 12 and incorporated as the Town of Columbia in 1796.
This association lasted for 67 years until Columbia Falls incorporated as a separate town in 1863.

event.title: incorporated as a separate town in 1863

data.event: This association lasted for 67 years until Columbia Falls incorporated as a separate town in 1863.
